trans-unit.source: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with TalentLMS | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Tutorial: Azure Active Directory Integration with TalentLMS | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use TalentLMS with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use TalentLMS with Azure Active Directory to enable single sign-on, automated provisioning, and more!.

trans-unit.source: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For feedback, click <linkText>here</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and TalentLMS.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this tutorial is to show the integration of Azure and TalentLMS.

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial assumes that you already have the following items:

trans-unit.source: A valid Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: A valid Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: A TalentLMS tenant
trans-unit.target: A TalentLMS tenant

trans-unit.source: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to TalentLMS will be able to single sign into the application at your TalentLMS company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: After completing this tutorial, the Azure AD users you have assigned to TalentLMS will be able to single sign into the application at your TalentLMS company site (service provider initiated sign on), or using the <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:
trans-unit.target: The scenario outlined in this tutorial consists of the following building blocks:

trans-unit.source: Enabling the application integration for TalentLMS
trans-unit.target: Enabling the application integration for TalentLMS

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on

trans-unit.source: Configuring user provisioning
trans-unit.target: Configuring user provisioning

trans-unit.source: Assigning users
trans-unit.target: Assigning users

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Scenario</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for TalentLMS.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable the application integration for TalentLMS.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management Portal, on the left navigation pane, click Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Active Directory</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.
trans-unit.target: From the Directory list, select the directory for which you want to enable directory integration.

trans-unit.source: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.
trans-unit.target: To open the applications view, in the directory view, click Applications in the top menu.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Applications</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Applications</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add application</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add application</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.
trans-unit.target: On the What do you want to do dialog, click Add an application from the gallery.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add an application from gallerry</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the search box, type TalentLMS.
trans-unit.target: In the search box, type TalentLMS.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Application gallery</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Application gallery</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the results pane, select TalentLMS, and then click Complete to add the application.
trans-unit.target: In the results pane, select TalentLMS, and then click Complete to add the application.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>TalentLMS</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>TalentLMS</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to TalentLMS with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this section is to outline how to enable users to authenticate to TalentLMS with their account in Azure AD using federation based on the SAML protocol.

trans-unit.source: Configuring single sign-on for TalentLMS requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Configuring single sign-on for TalentLMS requires you to retrieve a thumbprint value from a certificate.

trans-unit.source: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not familiar with this procedure, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, on the TalentLMS application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, on the TalentLMS application integration page, click Configure single sign-on to open the *Configure Single Sign On * dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the How would you like users to sign on to TalentLMS page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the How would you like users to sign on to TalentLMS page, select Microsoft Azure AD Single Sign-On, and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure single sign-on</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure App URL page, in the TalentLMS Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "https://\.TalentLMSapp.com", and then click Next.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure App URL page, in the TalentLMS Sign In URL textbox, type your URL using the following pattern "https://\.TalentLMSapp.com", and then click Next.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Sign on URL</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Sign on URL</linkText>

trans-unit.source: On the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally as c:\\TalentLMS.cer.
trans-unit.target: On the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS page, to download your certificate, click Download certificate, and then save the certificate file locally as c:\\TalentLMS.cer.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In a different web browser window, log into your TalentLMS company site as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: In a different web browser window, log into your TalentLMS company site as an administrator.

trans-unit.source: In the Account & Settings section, click the Users tab.
trans-unit.target: In the Account & Settings section, click the Users tab.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Account & Settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Account & Settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Single Sign-On (SSO),
trans-unit.target: Click Single Sign-On (SSO),

trans-unit.source: In the Single Sign-On section, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: In the Single Sign-On section, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: From the SSO integration type list, select SAML 2.0.
trans-unit.target: From the SSO integration type list, select SAML 2.0.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Identity Provider ID value, and then paste it into the Identity provider (IdP) textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Identity Provider ID value, and then paste it into the Identity provider (IdP) textbox.

trans-unit.source: Copy the Thumbprint value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the Certificate Fingerprint textbox.
trans-unit.target: Copy the Thumbprint value from the exported certificate, and then paste it into the Certificate Fingerprint textbox.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <linkText>How to retrieve a certificate's thumbprint value</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Remote sign-in URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Remote Login URL value, and then paste it into the Remote sign-in URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Remote Logout URL value, and then paste it into the Remote sign-out URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, on the Configure single sign-on at TalentLMS dialog page, copy the Remote Logout URL value, and then paste it into the Remote sign-out URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: In the TargetedID textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name
trans-unit.target: In the TargetedID textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name

trans-unit.source: In the First name textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname
trans-unit.target: In the First name textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname

trans-unit.source: In the Last name textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname
trans-unit.target: In the Last name textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname

trans-unit.source: In the Email textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress
trans-unit.target: In the Email textbox, type http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress

trans-unit.source: Click Save.
trans-unit.target: Click Save.

trans-unit.source: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.
trans-unit.target: On the Azure AD portal, select the single sign-on configuration confirmation, and then click Complete to close the Configure Single Sign On dialog.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configure Single Sign-On</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into TalentLMS, they must be provisioned into TalentLMS.
trans-unit.target: In order to enable Azure AD users to log into TalentLMS, they must be provisioned into TalentLMS.

trans-unit.source: In the case of TalentLMS, provisioning is a manual task.
trans-unit.target: In the case of TalentLMS, provisioning is a manual task.

trans-unit.source: Log in to your TalentLMS tenant.
trans-unit.target: Log in to your TalentLMS tenant.

trans-unit.source: Click Users, and then click Add User.
trans-unit.target: Click Users, and then click Add User.

trans-unit.source: On the Add user dialog page, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: On the Add user dialog page, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add User</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add User</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Type the related attribute values of the Azure AD user account into the following textboxes: First name, Last name, Email address.
trans-unit.target: Type the related attribute values of the Azure AD user account into the following textboxes: First name, Last name, Email address.

trans-unit.source: Click Add User.
trans-unit.target: Click Add User.

trans-unit.source: You can use any other TalentLMS user account creation tools or APIs provided by TalentLMS to provision AAD user accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can use any other TalentLMS user account creation tools or APIs provided by TalentLMS to provision AAD user accounts.

trans-unit.source: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.
trans-unit.target: To test your configuration, you need to grant the Azure AD users you want to allow using your application access to it by assigning them.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure AD portal, create a test account.

trans-unit.source: On the TalentLMS **application integration page, click **Assign users.
trans-unit.target: On the TalentLMS **application integration page, click **Assign users.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Assign users</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.
trans-unit.target: Select your test user, click Assign, and then click Yes to confirm your assignment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Yes</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Yes</linkText>

trans-unit.source: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.
trans-unit.target: If you want to test your single sign-on settings, open the Access Panel.

trans-unit.source: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more details about the Access Panel, see <linkText>Introduction to the Access Panel</linkText><title></title>.
